ygData.subject: Re: Instill doubt & Mana song strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re in the right place.  The skill may be called Intimidation though, I can t remember.  I know it was either labelled that or that was what he said
ygData.messageBody:
Proteus wrote:

> From: Proteus <pr0teus@...>
>
> I was wondering why this skill wasn't listed at the other trainers. I
> finally asked a fellow bard about it and he told me you have to train it
> with Caskin Marseheart upstairs in the Freeport's Bard Guild.
> Well I went to him and it still wasnt there. Am I dense or something and
> skip by it in the list? It should come after the Hand to Hand and Hide
> skill in alphabetical order, correct? I also scrolled through the entire
> list of skills and still didn't find it listed anywhere. I also left him
> and came back several times and still didn't see it listed.
> Ah well, maybe like I said, I'm just dense and managed to scroll past it
> 5 times without ever seeing it. I suppose I'll check again.

You're in the right place. The skill may be called "Intimidation" though, I
can't remember. I know it was either labelled that or that was what he said
to me when I trained in it. Perhaps both.

Jyzan
